Image.Alt: A patch of a person in a green shirt fishing in front of the Hudson River with a sunset in the background. The Castleton Bridge is on the left, and the number 53 is between its pillars. There is text around the outside that reads: Mahikan District 2008 Spring Camporee
Image.Caption: Camporee Patch featuring the Castleton Bridge on the Left.

Image.Alt: Scout Supper: Seth Hendrick of Boy Scouts Castleton Troop 53 cooks pizza in a dutch oven under a tent, sheltered from pouring rain during Schodack Island Scout Jamboree May 17. To his right is scout Jacob Parslow.
Image.Caption: Newspaper clipping from The Independent from the troop cooking dutch oven pizzas.
